Protocols/OutputProducingOperation.html#.name: injectOutput(into:)
Protocols/OutputProducingOperation.html#.abstract: Creates a new operation that passes the output of self into the given Operation input.

Protocols/OutputProducingOperation.html#.name: injectOutput(into:transform:)
Protocols/OutputProducingOperation.html#.abstract: Creates a new operation that passes the output of self into the given InputConsumingOperation operation after being transformed.

Protocols/FailableOperation.html#/s:17Ad.name: error
Protocols/FailableOperation.html#/s:17Ad.abstract: The error occurred during the operation evaluation.

Protocols/FailableOperation.html#/s:17Ad.name: isFailed
Protocols/FailableOperation.html#/s:17Ad.abstract: Returns true in the operation has finished with an error.

Protocols/FailableOperation.html.name: FailableOperation
Protocols/FailableOperation.html.abstract: Operations conformin to this protocolor may generate an error while executing.

Protocols/InputConsumingOperation.html.name: InputConsumingOperation
Protocols/InputConsumingOperation.html.abstract: Operations conforming to this protocol require an input before starting.

Protocols/OutputProducingOperation.html.name: OutputProducingOperation
Protocols/OutputProducingOperation.html.abstract: Operations conforming to this protocol produce an output once finished.

Protocols/TrackableOperation.html.name: TrackableOperation
Protocols/TrackableOperation.html.abstract: Operations conforming to this protcol can log their most relevant status changes.

Extensions/Sequence.html#/s:ST17Advanced.name: addDependencies(_:)
Extensions/Sequence.html#/s:ST17Advanced.abstract: Makes every operation in the sequence dependent on the completion of the specified operations.

Extensions/Sequence.html#/s:ST17Advanced.name: addDependencies(_:)
Extensions/Sequence.html#/s:ST17Advanced.abstract: Makes every operation in the sequence dependent on the completion of the specified operations.

Extensions/Operation.html#/s:So11NSOpera.name: hasSomeFailedDependencies
Extensions/Operation.html#/s:So11NSOpera.abstract: Returns true if at least one dependency conforming to FailableOperation has generated an error.

Extensions/Operation.html#/s:So11NSOpera.name: operationName
Extensions/Operation.html#/s:So11NSOpera.abstract: Returns the Operation name or its type if the name is nil.

Extensions/Operation.html#/s:So11NSOpera.name: hasSomeCancelledDependencies
Extensions/Operation.html#/s:So11NSOpera.abstract: Returns true if at least one dependency has been cancelled.

Extensions/Operation.html#/s:So11NSOpera.name: addCompletionBlock(asEndingBlock:block:)
Extensions/Operation.html#/s:So11NSOpera.abstract: Adds a completion block to be executed after the Operation enters the “finished” state.

Classes/KVOCrashWorkaround.html#/install.name: installFix()
Classes/KVOCrashWorkaround.html#/install.abstract: Install the workaround: it shoud be done from the main thread.

Classes/AsynchronousOperation.html#/c:@M.name: main()
Classes/AsynchronousOperation.html#/c:@M.abstract: The default implementation of this method does nothing.

Classes/AsynchronousOperation.html#/s:17.name: finish()
Classes/AsynchronousOperation.html#/s:17.abstract: Call this function to finish an operation that is currently executing.

Classes/AsynchronousBlockOperation.html#.name: Block
Classes/AsynchronousBlockOperation.html#.abstract: A closure type that takes a closure as its parameter.

Classes/AsynchronousBlockOperation.html.name: AsynchronousBlockOperation
Classes/AsynchronousBlockOperation.html.abstract: A sublcass of AsynchronousOperation to execute a closure.

Classes/AsynchronousOperation.html.name: AsynchronousOperation
Classes/AsynchronousOperation.html.abstract: An abstract thread safe subclass of Operation to support asynchronous operations.

Classes/KVOCrashWorkaround.html.name: KVOCrashWorkaround
Classes/KVOCrashWorkaround.html.abstract: Workaround to solve some multithreading bugs in Swift’s KVO.

Typealiases.html.name: Type Aliases
Typealiases.html.abstract: The following type aliases are available globally.
